name: Courtney McCormick
title: Brand Identity, User Interface, Motion Grapics, and Interactive Media Designer
bio: My name is Courtney, and I’m an interactive media designer based in Ontario, Canada. Taking inspiration from the world around me, I love to create immersive and interesting digital experiences. From photography to web design, I’m your one-stop-shop for all things media. Take a look at a few of my projects to see what I’m all about!
